revised_title: Noise Control in Textile Machinery: A Discussion on the Origin and Treatment of Noise in Industrial Environments
tldr: This article discusses the increasing noise levels in textile factories due to higher machine speeds and the need for noise control. It focuses on the noise associated with drawtwisting of synthetic yarns, its sources, and methods to suppress them. The author highlights the importance of reducing noise at the source and understanding the source mechanisms, transmission paths, and noise-radiating surfaces to achieve effective noise reduction.
